actions.text: Motion to table amendment SA 4859 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 31. Record Vote Number: 110.
Amendment SA 4859 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Johnson to Amendment SA 4858 (the instructions of the motion to commit).
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4859 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Johnson to Amendment SA 4858 (the instructions of the motion to commit).
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 4859 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 31. Record Vote Number: 110.

amends_amendment.purpose: To authorize the Attorney General to deny the transfer of firearms and explosives and Federal firearms and explosives licenses and permits to known or suspected terrorists.

purpose: To authorize the Attorney General to delay or deny the transfer of firearms and explosives and issuance of Federal firearms and explosives licenses and permits to known or suspected terrorists.
